hero.title: Crafting Elegance in Iron
hero.content: At Metal Monger, we transform the ordinary into the extraordinary, one piece of iron at a time. Let's collaborate and turn your vision into reality.

cards.title: Custom Solutions
cards.content: We specialize in fashioning one-of-a-kind ironwork creations that are as unique as your imagination. Our expertise lies in meticulously handcrafting custom pieces that reflect your individual style and preferences.

cards.title: Efficient Excellence
cards.content: Efficiency is at the core of our operations. At Metal Monger, we take pride in our ability to deliver high-quality ironwork with unmatched precision and in a timely manner.

cards.title: Locally Owned & Operated
cards.content: When you choose us, you're supporting a business that is committed to serving and enriching the local community. We take pride in being your trusted California ironwork artisans.

about.content:
I have over 18 years of experience in ornamental iron and have built over 200 spiral stairs cases throughout my career. I started Metal Monger Iron Works in 2018 with two goals in mind, quality and professionalism.
</br>
</br>
I believe in 100% customer satisfaction and will return all calls and inquires within 24 hours. I also strive to complete proposals within 48 hours with quick turn over time for projects. I believe in providing all clients with quality metal work that is both aesthetically pleasing and functional.

firstSection.title: Creations Built to Last,
firstSection.content: With our custom iron creations, you can transform your living space into a work of art. From intricate railings that adorn your staircase to elegant gates that welcome you home, every piece we create is tailored to your unique vision and the character of your residence.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Whether you need a new fence, stairs, repairs or advice, Metal Monger is here to help.

cards.title: Email us
cards.content: Email us or send a message above

cards.title: Location
cards.content: We service El Dorado County, Sacramento County, Nevada County, & Washoe County, NV Placer County, CA

testimonials.testimonial: “Metal Monger owner, Dan Walters, was a great find. He listened to our needs and took a personal interest in our satisfaction from design and function, to installation and overall value, to help us optimize our investment in our custom bannister and deliver the quality we had hoped to receive.”
testimonials.author: Jim Stoeltzingh

testimonials.testimonial: "Dan is the absolute best overall. Extremely responsive, and does great quality work. Was able to get my project completed in under 2 weeks on short notice. I would highly recommend him and will certainly call again!"
testimonials.author: Noah Mandel

testimonials.testimonial: "Awesome work!! Great attention to detail and very communicative."
testimonials.author: Freedom Landscaping

testimonials.testimonial: "Dan was super to work with and is definitely a talent in his trade. He made some artistic ornamental items for us and they exceeded expectations. We are so happy we found him and used him for this project. Will absolutely use him again for anything else needing custom iron work."
testimonials.author: Cheryl & Bill Anson

testimonials.testimonial: "Dan was fantastic. Excellent customer service, fair price, and very professional work. Was referred by a close friend and couldn’t have been happier with how my railings turned out."
testimonials.author: Corey Wood
